ovdesc.p: Amendment of virtual balance on AM.VIRTUAL.ACCOUNT table.

Amendments entered into this application do not pass through T24 accounting. This application is provided so that the 'cash position' of accounts belonging to virtual portfolios can be amended without affecting P&L. These accounts are not used for actual trading.

desc.p: Narrative for this virtual cash movement. This appears along with the amendment id as the transaction reference within the AM.VIRTUAL.ACCOUNT record.
Override messages generated against this transaction.
Account number to be credited or debited. This account must belong to a virtual portfolio.
Amount to be credited and debited expressed in terms of the account currency.

System date on which this virtual cash movement was posted to the virtual account. Cash movement can only be posted once, therefore if this field is completed, the amendment cannot be committed as it has already been posted.
